qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, what are the ages of patients L. Rogers and A. Smith?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers is 56 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith is 12 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, what are the chief complaints of patients L. Rogers and A. Smith?

content: Blurry, foggy vision and decreased visual acuity for the past 3 months
Fever, abdominal pain, and bloody stools for 1 week

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers' chief complaint is blurry, foggy vision and decreased visual acuity for the past 3 months; according to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith's chief complaint is fever, abdominal pain, and bloody stools for 1 week.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, what are the diagnoses of patients L. Rogers and A. Smith?

content: Bilateral Cataract, more pronounced in the right eye

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers was diagnosed with bilateral cataract, more pronounced in the right eye; according to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith was diagnosed with acute schistosomiasis.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, what is the ethnicity of patients L. Rogers and A. Smith?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital, patient L. Rogers is Caucasian; according to the hospitalization records of Farmington City Hospital, patient A. Smith is also Caucasian.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, who was admitted earlier, L. Rogers or A. Smith?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: L. Rogers was admitted on 6th January, and A. Smith was admitted on 9th October. L. Rogers was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Knoxville General Hospital and Farmington City Hospital, whose pulse rate is higher, L. Rogers or A. Smith?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: L. Rogers's pulse rate is 72 bpm, and A. Smith's pulse rate is 110 bpm. A. Smith's pulse rate is higher.
